pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dynamic Bayesian Network Learning and Inference // Learning and inference over dynamic Bayesian networks of arbitrary Markovian order. Extends some of the functionality offered by the 'bnlearn' package to learn the networks from data and perform exact inference. It offers a modification of Trabelsi (2013) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-41398-8_34 dynamic max-min hill climbing algorithm for structure learning and the possibility to perform forecasts of arbitrary length. A tool for visualizing the structure of the net is also provided via the 'visNetwork' package.
